name: Bounci Balls
description:
- Kill your boredom with this addictive ~10MB ball shooting game!
- Catapult the chain of balls at the falling blocks and discs to burst them. Stop any of the blocks from reaching the bottom.
- Difficulty increases as you play, so collect more balls to burst higher level blocks.

Features:
* Play with just a swipe
* Free
* Small file size
* Very easy to start playing
* Endless game play
* Set balls on fire
* Get special red balls
